title: Ticket #3279: Create a test for negotiator state surviving across a daemon restart
description: This is a test to make sure the negotiator can properly re-read its logs...
remarks:
2012-Nov-27 11:56:00 by wenger:
The plan is this: we have a DAG to test this, based on the existing job_dagman_condor_restart DAG. Nodes are as follows:
  1. Sets the priority factor of the current user to some fixed value (different than the existing value).
  2. Restarts Condor.
  3. Checks that the priority factor survived across the restart.

2012-Dec-07 11:45:24 by wenger:
Todd, if you think this looks okay, just uncomment the relevant line in CMakeLists.txt.
